If you drew a donkey like that, his mouth would be on the right hand side and tail on the left hand side. His feet would be at the bottom. There is no such thing as up and down for the donkey. He's stuck on flatland!

If you rotated the donkey so that his face was to the left... his legs would be on the top instead of the bottom.... and his tail would be on the right instead of the left.
